Nightshift subspaces the ball bearing and trades it for a Cybertronian kata=
na blade, whirling it gracefully into his hand.

" It's all good Wolfgang, =
just part of be'n a Ninjabot.  Anyway, I bet Tucson's use'n the same style =
of combat out there.  Not too many bots outside of the Ninjabot clan, are f=
amiliar with the fighting style."  Look for a shimmer of something shinny. =
 That will probably be the tip of his blade."

Perpetually on the move and =
constantly busy. 

On Sep 2, 2011, at 12:42 PM, Super Cyclonus <supercyclon=
us@...> wrote:

>> <OLD>
>> 
>> Nightshift tries to clear his mind be=
fore heading into the jungle.  He gives
>> a thumbs up to give the all is g=
ood gesture as he returns to his
>> premeditation as they approach their de=
stination.  As he remains tranquil,
>> he balances a small ball bearing off=
 of his right arm and skillfully rolls
>> it over each and every finger, ri=
ght to the fingertip and then flip the
>> object into his palm without a bo=
unce or dropping it on the floor.  As the
>> shuttle went over the turbulen=
ce, he still remains in perfect balance as the
>> ball bearing is rolled ba=
ck around his shoulders and onto his left arm.  It
>> finally gets balanced=
 in his left hand.
>> 
>> " Balance over chaos.  When one can achieve perfe=
ct balance within
>> instability, he is ready to even the most uneven of gr=
ound."
> 
> <NEW>
> 
> 
> As the ship flew on there was a small tone the be=
eped once indicating
> that communications had been cut off. They were on t=
heir own now,
> trying to find TUSCON and hopefully be close enough should =
he run into
> more trouble than they could handle. After all if there was s=
omething
> out there that could bring down both CYCLONUS and RODIMUS, TUSCO=
N
> could be in trouble fairly quickly. After all, there was something
> th=
at stopped them from returning.
> 
> The shuttle was flying over what appea=
red to be an ocean of trees!
> They rippled and undulated as the trees cove=
red mountains and valleys.
> Small rivers could be seen flowing through it =
as well, with a huge
> river running along the interior of it.
> 
> =E2=80=
=9CThere.=E2=80=9D PROWL said as he pointed to the front view. =E2=80=9CI h=
ave located
> where the dinosaurs possibly came from as they left the woods=
.=E2=80=9D
> 
> What PROWL was indicating was an area where it was obvious =
that a
> tremendous number of creatures of large must have burst out of the=

> jungle. Trees were twisted and knocked over, the grasses and such were
>=
 knocked flat, and there was a general devastation of the landscape.
> 
> =
=E2=80=9CI will bring us around.=E2=80=9D POLAR CLAW said from the pilot=E2=
=80=99s seat. =E2=80=9CWe
> need an over view first.=E2=80=9D
> 
> =E2=80=
=9CThings are about to get hot!=E2=80=9D POLAR CLAW announced. =E2=80=9CGet=
 ready.=E2=80=9D
> 
> PROWL nodded as RAMULUS leaned back in his chair gett=
ing ready for
> what lay ahead.
> 
> WOLFGANG said as an eager smile was on=
 his face. He definitely looked
> as if he felt ready. He looked over at NI=
GHTSHIFT watching the ball
> bearing he was balancing. He shook his head an=
d leaning back. =E2=80=9CTo each
> his own.=E2=80=9D He said.
